info.title: Etsy
info.description: This connector uses your API key to access various Etsy.com features. It supports actions for inventory, sales orders, and shop management. All actions are based on Etsy Open API v3 which does have endpoints that are still in beta. If such as actions use the beta API, the action with include Beta in the title and will return a 501 response code.

get.description: Check to confirm connectivity to the Etsy API with an application.

get.summary: Get a shop payment account ledger's entries
get.description: Retrieve the entries of a shop's payment account ledger.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: min_created
parameters.description: The earliest unix timestamp for when a record was created.

parameters.name: max_created
parameters.description: The latest unix timestamp for when a record was created.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.summary: Get a payment from a payment account ledger entry ID
get.description: Get a Payment from a Payment Account Ledger Entry ID, if applicable.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: ledger_entry_ids
parameters.description: Array of integers.

get.summary: Get a payment from a specific receipt
get.description: Retrieves a payment from a specific receipt, identified by receipt ID, from a specific shop, identified by shop ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: receipt_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the receipt associated to this transaction.

get.description: Retrieves a list of payments from a shop identified by shop ID. You can also filter results using a list of payment IDs.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: payment-ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated array of Payment IDs numbers.

get.description: Retrieves a receipt, identified by a receipt ID, from an Etsy shop.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: receipt_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the receipt associated to this transaction.

get.description: Requests the shop receipts from a specific shop, unfiltered or filtered by receipt ID range or offset, date, paid, and/or shipped purchases.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: min_created
parameters.description: The earliest unix timestamp for when a record was created.

parameters.name: max_created
parameters.description: The latest unix timestamp for when a record was created.

parameters.name: min_last_modified
parameters.description: The earliest unix timestamp for when a record last changed.

parameters.name: max_last_modified
parameters.description: The latest unix timestamp for when a record last changed.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

parameters.name: was_paid
parameters.description: When true, the seller received payment for the product(s) in this receipt.

parameters.name: was_shipped
parameters.description: When true, the seller shipped the product(s) in this receipt.

post.description: Submits tracking information for a shop receipt, which creates a shop receipt Shipment entry for the given receipt ID. Each time you successfully submit tracking info, Etsy sends a notification email to the buyer User. When send BCC is true, Etsy sends shipping notifications to the seller as well. When tracking code and carrier name aren't sent, the receipt is marked as shipped only.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: receipt_id
parameters.description: The receipt to submit tracking for.

tracking_code.description: The tracking code for this receipt.
tracking_code.title: Tracking Code

carrier_name.description: The carrier name for this receipt.
carrier_name.title: Carrier Name

send_bcc.description: If true, the shipping notification will be sent to the seller as well
send_bcc.title: Send BCC

get.description: Retrieves the list of transactions associated with a listing.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.description: Retrieves the list of transactions associated with a specific receipt.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: receipt_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the receipt associated to this transaction.

get.description: Retrieves a transaction by transaction ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID for a transaction.

get.description: Retrieves the list of transactions associated with a shop.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.description: Retrieves the reviews from a shop given its ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available shipping carriers and the mail classes associated with them for a given country.

parameters.name: origin_country_iso
parameters.description: The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.

get.description: Retrieves a list of shipping profiles available in the specific Etsy shop identified by its shop ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

post.description: Creates a new shipping profile. You can pass a country ISO code or a region when creating a shipping profile, but not both. Only one is required. You must pass either a shipping carrier ID and mail class, or both min and max delivery days.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

title.description: The name string of this shipping profile.
title.title: Title

origin_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.
origin_country_iso.title: Origin Country ISO

primary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region alone, measured in the store's default currency.
primary_cost.title: Primary Cost

secondary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region with another item, measured in the store's default currency.
secondary_cost.title: Secondary Cost

min_processing_time.description: The minimum time required to process to ship listings with this shipping profile.
min_processing_time.title: Minimum Processing Time

max_processing_time.description: The maximum processing time the listing needs to ship.
max_processing_time.title: Maximum Processing Time

processing_time_unit.description: The unit used to represent how long a processing time is. A week is equivalent to 5 business days.
processing_time_unit.title: Processing Time Unit

destination_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country to which the listing ships. If null, request sets destination to destination region.
destination_country_iso.title: Destination Country ISO

destination_region.description: The code of the region to which the listing ships. A region represents a set of countries. Supported regions are Europe Union and Non-Europe Union (countries in Europe not in EU). If "none", request sets destination to destination country ISO, or "everywhere" if destination country ISO is also null.
destination_region.title: Destination Region

origin_postal_code.description: The postal code string (not necessarily a number) for the location from which the listing ships.
origin_postal_code.title: Origin Postal Code

shipping_carrier_id.description: The unique ID of a supported shipping carrier, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date.
shipping_carrier_id.title: Shipping Carrier ID

mail_class.description: The unique ID string of a shipping carrier's mail class, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date.
mail_class.title: Mail Class

min_delivery_days.description: The minimum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped.
min_delivery_days.title: Minimum Delivery Days

max_delivery_days.description: The maximum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped.
max_delivery_days.title: Maximum Delivery Days

get.description: Retrieves a shipping profile referenced by shipping profile ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

delete.description: Deletes a shipping profile by given ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

put.description: Changes the settings in a shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

title.description: The name string of this shipping profile.
title.title: Title

origin_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.
origin_country_iso.title: Origin Country ISO

min_processing_time.description: The minimum time required to process to ship listings with this shipping profile.
min_processing_time.title: Minimum Processing Time

max_processing_time.description: The maximum processing time the listing needs to ship.
max_processing_time.title: Maximum Processing Time

processing_time_unit.description: The unit used to represent how long a processing time is. A week is equivalent to 5 business days. If none is provided, the unit is set to "business_days".
processing_time_unit.title: Processing Time Unit

origin_postal_code.description: The postal code string (not necessarily a number) for the location from which the listing ships.
origin_postal_code.title: Origin Postal Code

get.summary: Get profile destinations by shipping profile
get.description: Retrieves a list of shipping destination objects associated with a shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

post.description: Creates a new shipping destination, which sets the shipping cost, carrier, and class for a destination in a shipping profile. This assigns costs using the currency of the associated shop. Set the destination using either destination country ISO or destination region; destination country ISO and destination region are mutually exclusive â€” set one or the other. Setting both triggers error 400. If the request sets neither destination country ISO nor destination region, the default destination is everywhere. You must also either assign both a shipping carrier ID and mail class or both min delivery days and max delivery days.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

primary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region alone, measured in the store's default currency.
primary_cost.title: Primary Cost

secondary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region with another item, measured in the store's default currency.
secondary_cost.title: Secondary Cost

delete.description: Deletes a shipping destination and removes the destination option from every listing that uses the associated shipping profile. A shipping profile requires at least one shipping destination, so this endpoint cannot delete the final shipping destination for any shipping profile. To delete the final shipping destination from a shipping profile, you must delete the entire shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_destination_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile destination in the shipping profile associated with the listing.

put.description: Updates an existing shipping destination, which can set or reassign the shipping cost, carrier, and class for a destination.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_destination_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile destinationassociated with the listing.

get.description: Retrieves the list of shipping profile upgrades assigned to a specific shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

post.description: Creates a new shipping profile upgrade, which can establish a price for a shipping option, such as an alternate carrier or faster delivery.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

type.description: The type of the shipping upgrade. Domestic (0) or international (1).
type.title: Type

upgrade_name.description: Name for the shipping upgrade shown to shoppers at checkout, e.g. USPS Priority.
upgrade_name.title: Upgrade Name

price.description: Additional cost of adding the shipping upgrade.
price.title: Price

secondary_price.description: Additional cost of adding the shipping upgrade for each additional item.
secondary_price.title: Secondary Price

shipping_carrier_id.description: The unique ID of a supported shipping carrier, which is used to calculate an Estimated Delivery Date.
shipping_carrier_id.title: Shipping Carrier ID

mail_class.description: The unique ID string of a shipping carrier's mail class, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date.
mail_class.title: Mail Class

max_delivery_days.description: The maximum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped.
max_delivery_days.title: Maximum Delivery Days

delete.description: Deletes a shipping profile upgrade and removes the upgrade option from every listing that uses the associated shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile.

parameters.name: upgrade_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID that is associated with a shipping upgrade

put.description: Updates a shipping profile upgrade and updates any listings that use the shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: upgrade_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID that is associated with a shipping upgrade

type.description: The type of the shipping upgrade. Domestic (0) or international (1).
type.title: Type

upgrade_name.description: Name for the shipping upgrade shown to shoppers at checkout, e.g. USPS Priority.
upgrade_name.title: Upgrade Name

price.description: Additional cost of adding the shipping upgrade.
price.title: Price

secondary_price.description: Additional cost of adding the shipping upgrade for each additional item.
secondary_price.title: Secondary Price

shipping_carrier_id.description: The unique ID of a supported shipping carrier, which is used to calculate an Estimated Delivery Date.
shipping_carrier_id.title: Shipping Carrier ID

mail_class.description: The unique ID string of a shipping carrier's mail class, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date.
mail_class.title: Mail Class

max_delivery_days.description: The maximum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped.
max_delivery_days.title: Maximum Delivery Days

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

title.description: A brief heading string for the shop's main page.
title.title: Title

announcement.description: An announcement string to buyers that displays on the shop's homepage.
announcement.title: Announcement

sale_message.description: A message string sent to users who complete a purchase from this shop.
sale_message.title: Sale Message

digital_sale_message.description: A message string sent to users who purchase a digital item from this shop.
digital_sale_message.title: Digital Sale Message

put.description: Update a shop. Assumes that all string parameters are provided in the shop's primary language.

get.description: Retrieves the shop identified by the shop owner's user ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The numeric user ID of the user who owns this shop.

get.description: Returns a list of shops with the matching name.

parameters.name: shop_name
parameters.description: The shop's name string.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.description: Retrieves the list of shop sections in a specific shop identified by shop ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

post.description: Creates a new section in a specific shop.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

title.description: The title string for a shop section.
title.title: Title

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an user.

get.description: Returns user profile for the user identified by a user ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shop_section_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of a section in a specific Etsy shop.

get.description: Retrieves the list of shop sections in a specific shop identified by shop ID.

parameters.name: user_address_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the user's address.

get.description: Retrieves the user's address.  Development for this endpoint is in progress. It will only return a 501 response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.description: Retrieve a list of user addresses.
Retrieves the full hierarchy tree of seller taxonomy nodes.

get.summary: Get product properties by taxonomy ID
get.description: Retrieves a list of product properties, with applicable scales and values, supported for a specific seller taxonomy ID.

parameters.name: taxonomy_id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of an Etsy taxonomy node, which is a metadata category for listings organized into the seller taxonomy hierarchy tree.

get.description: Returns listings that belong to a Shop. Listings can be filtered using the state parameter.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: An enumerated string from any of: active or inactive.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

parameters.name: Sort On
parameters.description: The value to sort a search result of listings on.

parameters.name: Sort Order
parameters.description: The ascending(up) or descending(down) order to sort listings by.

post.description: Creates a physical draft listing product in a shop on the Etsy channel.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing.
quantity.title: Quantity

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{P}\p{Sm}\p{Zs}™©®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.
title.title: Title

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.
description.title: Description

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price.
price.title: Price

who_made.description: An string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.
who_made.title: Who Made

when_made.description: A string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.
when_made.title: When Made

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.
taxonomy_id.title: Taxonomy ID

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.
shipping_profile_id.title: Shipping Profile ID

materials.description: A array of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
materials.title: Materials

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of the shop section for this listing.
shop_section_id.title: Shop Section ID

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_min.title: Processing Minimum

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_max.title: Processing Maximum

tags.description: An array of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}-'™©®]/u)
tags.title: Tags

recipient.description: A string indicating a person for whom this product would make an appropriate gift.
recipient.title: Recipient

occasion.description: A string indicating an occassion for which this product would make an appropriate gift.
occasion.title: Occasion

styles.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as "Formal", or "Steampunk". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
styles.title: Styles

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in item weight unit.
item_weight.title: Item Weight

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in item dimensions unit.
item_length.title: Item Length

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_width.title: Item Width

item_height.description: The numeric height of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_height.title: Item Height

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product.
item_weight_unit.title: Item Weight Unit

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product.
item_dimensions_unit.title: Item Dimensions Unit

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable.
is_personalizable.title: Is Personalizable

image_ids.description: An array of numeric image IDs of the images in a listing, which can include up to 10 images.
image_ids.title: Image IDs

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product, else indicates that it's a finished product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading. Requires 'who made' and 'when made'.
is_supply.title: Is Supply

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.
is_customizable.title: Is Customizable

is_taxable.description: When true, applicable shop tax rates apply to this listing at checkout.
is_taxable.title: Is Taxable

get.description: Retrieves a listing record by listing ID.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: includes
parameters.description: An enumerated string that attaches a valid association. Acceptable inputs are 'shop', 'images' and 'user'.

delete.description: This action deletes a shop listing. A listing can be deleted only if the state is one of the following: SOLD_OUT, DRAFT, EXPIRED, INACTIVE, ACTIVE and is_available or ACTIVE and has seller flags: SUPRESSED (frozen), VACATION, CUSTOM_SHOPS (pattern), SELL_ON_FACEBOOK

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

get.description: A list of all active listings on Etsy paginated by their creation date. Without sort order listings will be returned newest-first by default.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Search term or phrase that must appear in all results.

parameters.name: sort_on
parameters.description: The value to sort a search result of listings on. NOTE: sort on only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The ascending(up) or descending(down) order to sort listings by. NOTE: sort_order only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: The minimum price of listings to be returned by a search result.

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: The maximum price of listings to be returned by a search result.

parameters.name: taxonomy_id
parameters.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.

parameters.name: shop_location
parameters.description: Filters by shop location. If location cannot be parsed, Etsy responds with an error.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all active listings on Etsy in a specific shop, paginated by listing creation date.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Search term or phrase that must appear in all results.

get.description: Allows to query multiple listing IDs at once. Limit 100 IDs maximum per query.

parameters.name: listing_ids
parameters.description: The array of numeric IDs for the listings in a specific Etsy shop.

parameters.name: includes
parameters.description: An enumerated string that attaches a valid association.

get.description: Retrieves listings associated to a shop that are featured.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

delete.description: Deletes a property from a listing.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of an Etsy listing property.

put.description: Updates or populates the properties list defining product offerings for a listing. Each offering requires both a value and a value ID that are valid for a scale ID assigned to the listing or that you assign to the listing with this request.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of an Etsy listing property.

value_ids.description: The numeric ID of a single Etsy.com measurement scale.
value_ids.title: Value IDs

values.description: An array of value strings for multiple Etsy listing property values.
values.title: Values

scale_id.description: The numeric ID of a single Etsy.com measurement scale.
scale_id.title: Scale ID

get.description: Retrieves a listing's property. Development for this endpoint is in progress. It will only return a 501 response.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of an Etsy listing property.

get.description: Returns a list of a listing's properties.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

put.description: Updates a listing, identified by a listing ID, for a specific shop identified by a shop ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing.
quantity.title: Quantity

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{P}\p{Sm}\p{Zs}™©®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.
title.title: Title

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.
description.title: Description

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price.
price.title: Price

who_made.description: An string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.
who_made.title: Who Made

when_made.description: A string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.
when_made.title: When Made

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.
taxonomy_id.title: Taxonomy ID

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.
shipping_profile_id.title: Shipping Profile ID

materials.description: A array of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
materials.title: Materials

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of the shop section for this listing.
shop_section_id.title: Shop Section ID

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_min.title: Processing Minimum

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_max.title: Processing Maximum

tags.description: An array of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}-'™©®]/u)
tags.title: Tags

recipient.description: A string indicating a person for whom this product would make an appropriate gift.
recipient.title: Recipient

occasion.description: A string indicating an occassion for which this product would make an appropriate gift.
occasion.title: Occasion

styles.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as "Formal", or "Steampunk". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
styles.title: Styles

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in item weight unit.
item_weight.title: Item Weight

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in item dimensions unit.
item_length.title: Item Length

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_width.title: Item Width

item_height.description: The numeric height of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_height.title: Item Height

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product.
item_weight_unit.title: Item Weight Unit

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product.
item_dimensions_unit.title: Item Dimensions Unit

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable.
is_personalizable.title: Is Personalizable

image_ids.description: An array of numeric image IDs of the images in a listing, which can include up to 10 images.
image_ids.title: Image IDs

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product, else indicates that it's a finished product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading. Requires 'who made' and 'when made'.
is_supply.title: Is Supply

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.
is_customizable.title: Is Customizable

is_taxable.description: When true, applicable shop tax rates apply to this listing at checkout.
is_taxable.title: Is Taxable

featured_ rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the featured listings of the shop with rank 1 listings appearing in the left-most position in featured listing on a shop’s home page.
featured_ rank.title: Featured Rank

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expriation. If set to true when previously false, etsy.com renews the listing before it expires, but the renewal period starts immidiately rather than extending the listing's expiration date. Any unused time remaining on the listing is lost. Renewals result in charges to a user's bill.
should_auto_renew.title: Should Auto Renew

type.description: Indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.
type.title: Type

channels.description: An array of enumerated channel ID strings. A channel is a venue for sellers to reach buyers in order to make sales.
channels.title: Channels

get.description: Gets all listings associated with a receipt.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the receipt associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: receipt_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

get.summary: Get listings by shop section ID
get.description: Retrieves all the listings from the section of a specific shop.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shop_section_ids
parameters.description: A array of numeric IDs for all sections in a specific Etsy shop.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

parameters.name: sort_on
parameters.description: The value to sort a search result of listings on.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The ascending(up) or descending(down) order to sort listings by.

get.summary: Get a file from a listing
get.description: Retrieves a single file associated with the given digital listing. Requesting a file from a physical listing returns an empty result.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: listing_file_id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of a file associated with a digital listing.

delete.description: When you delete the final file for a digital listing, the listing converts into a physical listing. The response to a delete request returns a list of the remaining file records associated with the given listing.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: listing_file_id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of a file associated with a digital listing.

get.description: Retrieves all the files associated with the given digital listing. Requesting files from a physical listing returns an empty result.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

post.description: Uploads a new file for a digital listing, or associates an existing file with a specific listing. You must either provide the listing file ID of an existing file, or the name and binary file data for a file to upload. Associating an existing file to a physical listing converts the physical listing into a digital listing, which removes all shipping costs and any product and inventory variations.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

listing_file_id.description: The unique numeric ID of a file associated with a digital listing.
listing_file_id.title: Listing File ID

name.description: The file name string of a file to upload
name.title: Name

rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the images displayed in a listing, with rank 1 images appearing in the left-most position in a listing.
rank.title: Rank

get.description: Retrieves the references and metadata for a listing image with a specific image ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: listing_image_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the primary listing image for this transaction.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: listing_image_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the primary listing image for this transaction.

delete.description: Deletes a listing image. A copy of the file remains on our servers, and so a deleted image may be re-associated with the listing without re-uploading the original image.

get.description: Retrieves all listing image resources for a listing with a specific listing ID.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

post.description: Uploads or assigns an image to a listing identified by a shop ID with a listing ID. To upload a new image, set the image file as the value for the image parameter. You can assign a previously deleted image to a listing using the deleted image's image ID in the listing image ID parameter. When a request contains both image and listing image ID parameter values, the endpoint uploads the image in the image parameter only.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

image.description: The file name string of a file to upload.
image.title: Image

listing_image_id.description: The numeric ID of the primary listing image for this transaction.
listing_image_id.title: Listing Image ID

rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the images displayed in a listing, with rank 1 images appearing in the left-most position in a listing.
rank.title: Rank

overwrite.description: When true, this request replaces the existing image at a given rank.
overwrite.title: Overwrite

is_watermarked.description: When true, indicates that the uploaded image has a watermark.
is_watermarked.title: Is Watermarked

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: includes
parameters.description: An enumerated string that attaches an valid association.

get.description: Retrieves the inventory record for a listing. Listings you did not edit using the Etsy.com inventory tools have no inventory records. This endpoint returns SKU data if you are the owner of the inventory records being fetched.

put.description: Updates the inventory for a listing identified by a listing ID. The update fails if the supplied values for product SKU, offering quantity, and/or price are incompatible with values in on property fields. When setting a price, assign a float equal to amount divided by divisor as specified in the money resource.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

products.description: A JSON array of products available in a listing, even if only one product. All field names in the JSON blobs are lowercase.
products.title: Products

price_on_property.description: An array of unique listing property ID integers for the properties that change product prices, if any. For example, if you charge specific prices for different sized products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for size.
price_on_property.title: Price on Property

quantity_on_property.description: An array of unique listing property ID integers for the properties that change the quantity of the products, if any. For example, if you stock specific quantities of different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.
quantity_on_property.title: Quantity on Property

sku_on_property.description: An array of unique listing property ID integers for the properties that change the product SKU, if any. For example, if you use specific skus for different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.
sku_on_property.title: SKU on Property

get.description: Get an offering for a listing.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the product associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: product_offering_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the product offering associated to this transaction.

get.description: Retrieve a listing product by ID.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The listing to return a listing product for.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for a specific product purchased from a listing.

get.description: Returns the translation for a listing in the given language.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The IETF language tag for the language of this translation. Ex: de, en, es, fr, it, ja, nl, pl, pt, ru.

post.description: Creates a listing translation by listing ID and language.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The IETF language tag for the language of this translation. Ex: de, en, es, fr, it, ja, nl, pl, pt, ru.

title.description: The title of the Listing of this Translation.
title.title: Title

description.description: The description of the Listing of this Translation.
description.title: Description

tags.description: The tags of the Listing of this Translation.
tags.title: Tags

put.description: Updates a listing translation by listing ID and language.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The IETF language tag for the language of this translation. Ex: de, en, es, fr, it, ja, nl, pl, pt, ru.

title.description: The title of the Listing of this Translation.
title.title: Title

description.description: The description of the Listing of this Translation.
description.title: Description

tags.description: The tags of the Listing of this Translation.
tags.title: Tags

get.description: Gets all variation images on a listing.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

post.description: Creates variation images on a listing.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

variation_images.description: A array of variation image data.
variation_images.title: Variation Images
